author: marvin
msg: Add docs for routines which had been missing them previously.  Make a few
corrections and make some superficial name changes for clarity's sake.

author: pmouawad
msg: Bug 52897 - HTTPSampler : Using PUT method with HTTPClient4 and empty Content Encoding and sending files leads to NullPointerException

author: karl
msg: * configure.ac: Default separate virtual interps to "no".
(--enable-virtual-interps-separation option implies disabled if not set.)
* rivet/packages/form/form.tcl: In the forms package, stop bleeding the
raw value of radio buttons and checkboxes into the generated HTML.
* src/apache-2/mod_rivet.c: Rework ap_log_error calls to include the
mod_rivet module name.  Emit debug-level messages for successful
* README.freebsd: Update to reflect the modern world.
* README.configure: Document how to regenerate the configure script, etc.
tclconfig/config.sub, tclconfig/ltmain.sh: Update from newer libtools, etc.

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-214: improving quickstart site doc to explicitly specify archetypeVersion; minor fix to contributors guide due to restructuring of minotaur.apache.org to use CMS

author: joes
msg: cause is starting to look switch-related instead of host-related
